title: Manchin in the middle | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Joe Biden won the presidency, but it’s Joe Manchin from West Virginia who seems to be the decider. The Charleston Gazette-Mail’s Joe Severino shadowed Senator Joe in the spotlight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Manchin in the middle | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: So far, he's torpedoed one of Biden's cabinet picks, obstructed the minimum wage, and opposed a big stimulus.
